1:
CIRCULAR 33 / 2000 
 
 
SUB: DETECTION WEAPON AT LADDER POINT BY AIRLINE 
SECURITY 
 
 
 
It has been brought to the notice of this Bureau that at Mumbai Airport the APS staff 
failed to detect weapons and ammunition from the hand baggage of two passengers bound for 
flight No.IC-888 on 16.03.2000.  The same were detected by Indian Airlines security staff at 
the ladder point.  In this connection attention is brought  to instructions issued vide AVSEC 
Order No. 2/2000 dated 17.05.2000 (copy enclosed).  Necessary legal action against the 
defaulters is to be taken under Section 11 (A) of Aircraft Act, 1934. 
 
(R.K.Singh) 
ADDL.COMMISSIONER OF SECURITY (CA) 
` 
 
 
for Commissioner of Security (CA) 
 
NO.CAS-7(2) / 99-DIV-I 
Dated : 19.10.2000
